title: PBE is back.....wait wut?!

embed.description: Hey PBE comrades, It’s about time to get some fresh blood in here to join the dedicated veterans. PBE sign-ups have been closed while we’ve been working on tech and feature upgrades. Well, that’s done! Let’s open the floodgates so that players can get their hands on upcomi

body:
http://gifimage.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/its-happening-gif-the-office-10.gif

The time has come! Or has it! WHAT THE HECK!?!?!?!!

Is what I'm sure all of you are thinking right about now. PBE Signups have officially launched again, but it looks like we underestimated the traffic of that page a wee bit. The "Check Eligibility" tool *is* working, it's just that so many of you guys are excited to try PBE that the tool is working a little slower than it should. 

Please be patient with the PBE signups for now while it catches up with checking everyone's eligibility. If it hasn't worked for you yet, give it a couple hours and try again. 

Be sure to shoot your [**PBE feedback over here**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/JtsFmpNI-pbe-sign-ups-are-open)!


EDIT: We now have a [**status page up for PBE**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)!

replies.body:
I am getting this error
Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again. and have done that multiple times and to no avail
Yep!  This is because the site is getting hugged to death, so to speak.  There are_ a lot_ of players accessing the service, so wait it out a bit and hang tight!

Oh hey! I need help like ASAP. So your website is not working form me http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#my-picks/bracket
When I lock in the team that I want it gives me this message "THERE WAS AN ERROR: INTERNAL SERVER ERROR" And I cant lock in the teams. HELP ME PLZ! 
Love ya!
I've been trying for two hours and keep getting the error, is there a deadline for the sign-up?
I just got the check eligibility to work but after typing in my username and password it still said refresh and now I can't get there again.

No deadlines at the moment, but as I mentioned in the post we might not all be able to sign up right at this moment. Give it a little time, or try again tomorrow, but we will all be able to get in eventually!
Im getting the problem with wrong username and password even tho its correct

PBE is downloading with 650kb and its slowing down
i wrote a review please help

Hi, I dont play on NA anymore and stopped right before honor launched so I'm still honor 2, although I play on Garena now and have honor 3 there. I'm still interested in signing up for PBE, is it possible? :)

My issue is a bit weird, So a long while back i got an email for the pbe signup on 3/15/17, and when I got around to trying to signup the site had been shutdown. (and has been for the last 6 months) Is there anyway you guys can link my account for me because I had been waiting a long time for this and I can't seem to get the signup button to work.
